name: RyZen
description:
Help Lester, the rabbit, gather all the goodies as he travels from plane to plane, while avoiding all the dangerous carnivores starving for some fresh rabbit meat! 

...WAIT, WHY IS THERE A TIGER IN THIS GAM...  *ANGRY TIGER NOISES*

HOW TO PLAY:
  • SPACE BAR to Record/Play moves.
  • WASD or ARROW KEYS to input moves once it's recording.
  • R to reset the current inputs while recording.
  • ESC  to exit the game in the desktop version.
  • THE COUNTER IN THE TOP RIGHT DISPLAYS YOUR CURRENT MOVES AND REQUIRED AMOUNT OF INPUTS BEFORE YOU CAN PLAY THEM!
TL;DR CONTROLS:
  • SPACE, WASD / ARROWKEYS, R, (ESC DESKTOP ONLY).
INFO:

Made for "Mini-Jam 93: Vacation" with the limitation of 'Indirect Control' as my first ever game jam and first ever published game.

Finished in 14 non-consecutive hours with an additional 6ish hours of post submission polish.

 ADDITIONAL CREDITS: ART ASSETS BY :  

https://withering-systems.itch.io/  

(with minor edits by me)
